title: Traditional statistical methods outperform ML in time-series forecasting
articleSnippet: A recent paper compares the performance of traditional time series forecasting with ML, with a focus on NNs, on a set of time series forecasting problems.

title: New BLK Directory for Copying Logfiles
articleSnippet: All logs that are copied for preservation and inspection to BLK should be placed in /proj/logreview.  There are two subfolders norad and adhoc.

title: GFI Responsible Investing Dashboard
articleSnippet: ESG data aims to provide metrics that quantify a company's exposure to and management of environmental, social and governance issues.

title: BlackRock Academic Partnerships
articleSnippet: If your business unit already engages in academic partnerships - whether it's conference participation, research sponsorships, PhD internships, or the like and the funding is sponsored within your business unit (or it's no-cost), great. Your business may continue to lead that effort;

title: BEN (Aladdin Risk) - Data remediation and streamlining process/workflows
articleSnippet: The purpose of this page is to raise the awareness about on-going initiatives related to BEN remediation.

title: Performance Weighted Composite Benchmark
articleSnippet: A normal float composite benchmark floats based on the market value of the underlying component indices. A performance weight composite benchmark floats based on the market value of the actual portfolios benched against the benchmark.

title: AMONE(ex DIAM) Package Documentation
articleSnippet: AMONE is an asset management company based in Tokyo, which was formed as a result of merger of ex Mizuho 3 asset management entities, namely MHTB, MHAM, SHINKO and a seperate asset management company DIAM
